comments.creator: cdleary@acm.org
comments.author: cdleary@acm.org
comments.text:
This makes it impossible to know who's writing without visiting the permalink.

If it's too burdensome to inform all the existing authors lacking this metadata, maybe we could check that new syndicated feeds have it before adding them to planet?
